title: Murder at the Heights: A Faye-Lynn Johnson Mystery
description: IS SHE THE PERFECT WIFE?A beautiful spring day in Frederick is shattered when the home of a family of six becomes a crime five of them dead, one—the mother—missing. Was she lucky to have escaped? Or is her absence evidence of something sinister?OR IS SHE THE PERFECT KILLER?Detective Faye-Lynn Johnson is on the case seeking justice and must make sense of the clues left behind. The young woman who, whether as victim or suspect, is silently pleading, Look for me.
author: Ricky Corum
